tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
  transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
  from_address VARCHAR(100),
  to_address VARCHAR(100),
  amount DECIMAL,
  transaction_hash VARCHAR(255),
  block_number INT
)

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    block_number INT,
    sender_address TEXT,
    receiver_address TEXT,
    amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    block_id INT,
    transaction_hash VARCHAR(255),
    transaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    sender_address VARCHAR(255),
    receiver_address VARCHAR(255),
    amount DECIMAL(18, 2),
    transaction_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE block_details (
    block_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    block_hash VARCHAR(255),
    block_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    total_transactions INT,
    block_size INT,
    miner_address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE address_details (
    address_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    address VARCHAR(255),
    total_received DECIMAL(18, 2),
    total_sent DECIMAL(18, 2),
    balance DECIMAL(18, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  block_number INT NOT NULL,
  transaction_hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  from_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  to_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(18, 2) NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE blocks (
  block_number INT PRIMARY KEY,
  miner_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  block_reward DECIMAL(18, 2) NOT NULL,
  total_transactions_count INT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    block_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL,
    sender_address VARCHAR(255),
    receiver_address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE block_information (
    block_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    block_hash VARCHAR(255),
    block_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    miner_address VARCHAR(255),
    transaction_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE address_info (
    address_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    address VARCHAR(255),
    total_transactions INT,
    total_amount_received DECIMAL,
    total_amount_sent DECIMAL
);
